title: HOUR 2 - The 49ers Are Alive
itunes:title: HOUR 2 - The 49ers Are Alive
description:
In this hour of The Herd with Colin Cowherd, Doug Gottlieb--in for Colin--believes the San Francisco 49ers are one of the most dangerous teams in the NFC after finally getting healthy. Also, the Green Bay Packers might have had plans to eventually get rid of quarterback Aaron Rodgers, but Doug argues that the Packers' brass must keep Rodgers in Green Bay for the rest of his career.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
